#summary Component Reference

= Components =

[ReferenceComponentAccelerometerSensor AccelerometerSensor] - Sensor to measure acceleration in 3 dimensions

[ReferenceComponentButton Button] - Push-style button

[ReferenceComponentCanvas Canvas] - Surface to draw on

[ReferenceComponentCheckBox CheckBox] - Two state button that can either be checked or un-checked

[ReferenceComponentEmailPicker EmailPicker] - Editable text box using auto-completion to pick out an email address from contacts

[ReferenceComponentForm Form] - Root component container

[ReferenceComponentImage Image] - Component for displaying images

[ReferenceComponentLabel Label] - Text display

[ReferenceComponentLocationSensor LocationSensor] - Sensor to provide information about the current location

[ReferenceComponentOrientationSensor OrientationSensor] - Sensor to measure absolute orientation in 3 dimensions

[ReferenceComponentPanel Panel] - Container for other components

[ReferenceComponentPasswordTextBox PasswordTextBox] - Editable text box for entering passwords

[ReferenceComponentPhone Phone] - Component providing phone-related functionality

[ReferenceComponentRadioButton RadioButton] - Two state button that can either be checked or un-checked

[ReferenceComponentTextBox TextBox] - Editable text box

[ReferenceComponentTimer Timer] - Timer component

= Layouts =

[ReferenceComponentFrameLayout 	FrameLayout] - Layout for prominently showing a single component

[ReferenceComponentLinearLayout LinearLayout] - Layout for placing components horizontally or vertically

[ReferenceComponentTableLayout TableLayout] - Layout for placing components in tabular form
